parameters.pythonCode:
def escape_markdown_v2(text: str) -> str:
    """
    Escape all Telegram MarkdownV2 special characters
    WITHOUT using regex.
    """
    special_chars = {
        '_', '*', '[', ']', '(', ')',
        '~', '`', '>', '#', '+', '-',
        '=', '|', '{', '}', '.', '!'
    }

    escaped = []
    for ch in text:
        if ch in special_chars:
            escaped.append('\\' + ch)
        else:
            escaped.append(ch)

    return ''.join(escaped)


# Build the message with monospace stacktrace
workflow_name = _item['json']['workflow']['name']
node_name = _item['json']['execution']['lastNodeExecuted']
error_msg = _item['json']['execution']['error']['message']
stacktrace = _item['json']['execution']['error']['stack']
url = _item['json']['execution']['url']

message = (
    f"*WORKFLOW ERROR*\n\n"
    f"*Workflow:* {escape_markdown_v2(workflow_name)}\n"
    f"*Node:* {escape_markdown_v2(node_name)}\n"
    f"*Error:* {escape_markdown_v2(error_msg)}\n"
    f"*Execution:* [open]({escape_markdown_v2(url)})\n\n"
    f"*Stacktrace:*\n"
    f"```\n{escape_markdown_v2(stacktrace)}\n```"
)

return {"message": message}

def escape_markdown_v2(text: str) -> str:
    """
    Escape all Telegram MarkdownV2 special characters
    WITHOUT using regex.
    """
    special_chars = {
        '_', '*', '[', ']', '(', ')',
        '~', '`', '>', '#', '+', '-',
        '=', '|', '{', '}', '.', '!'
    }

    escaped = []
    for ch in text:
        if ch in special_chars:
            escaped.append('\\' + ch)
        else:
            escaped.append(ch)

    return ''.join(escaped)
